task_description: Facing the building to your West (approx. 258°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the top of the structure since my current pitch is level with the ground.
I need to adjust my heading to face the building directly to the west, as my current heading is north.
To estimate the height, I need to look up again to see the top of the building as my pitch is currently level with the ground.
I need to rotate my heading back to 258° to face the building directly while maintaining the upward pitch to view the top.
With the current view facing the building and looking up, I can now estimate the height based on the visible structure.
